Articles.Content:
Hello,

I have a problem with unmanned vessls. Every time I fly to the Mun or further, my vessel begins to spin if I deactivate SAS. As if there is a invicible force. The funny thing is: it doesn't occure if I`m in low or hight Orbit of Kerbin.
I use a lot of mods and don`t know which is triggering this.

KSP 1.8.1

KSP.log
